name: 2024 The 8th International Conference on E-Education, E-Business, and E-Technology
content: Publication: Conference Proceedings All submissions will be peer reviewed, and the accepted papers will be published in the International Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus. For those who're NOT looking to publish their papers, it's acceptable to submit your abstracts to the conference, which will be sent to at least two technical committees for a brief review, and it will take about 7-10 working days.
